knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r packages}
library(tidyverse)
library(knitr)
library(reticulate)

# install python packages using conda
py_install("pandas")
py_install("numpy")
```

```{python}
# Run python code like this
print('hello world')
# create a new python session variable
x = 1
```


```{r}
# Run R code in these chunks like normal
print('hello world')

# acccess our python session variables
print(py$x)

# create a new variable to access in the python session
py$y <- c(1,2,3)

y <- 'cow'
```

```{python}
# access python session variables from python chunks
y

# You can't access R session variables from python chunks
R$y
```
